title: How to Draw Jigglypuff

steps.headline: Draw a big round circle to indicate the shape of Jigglypuff's body and head.
Erase the top part of the shape (the head) and draw the tuft.
steps.description: It is kind of like a big G, only the top portion is a bit curved.

steps.headline: On the left side of the tuft, draw an upside-down V on the head, so it looks like an ear.
steps.description: On the right side, make the upside-down V a bit slanted to the right.

steps.headline: In the middle portion of the circle, erase the line there on the left side only and draw a small sideways v. Make sure the pointed part is facing the outside of Jigglypuff.
Add another small upside-down "v" to the inside of both ears.
At the bottom part of Jigglypuff, draw little ovals on both sides, a bit slanted.
For the other hand, draw a normal "v" right above the right foot.
Add the eyes right on the right and left side of the tuff.
steps.description: Draw a medium circle, and a smaller circle on the outside. Draw a even smaller circle inside the small circle. This will be the pupil.

steps.headline: Right below the eyes, draw a tiny little curved smiling mouth.
Add colour to your finished Jigglypuff.
Add shadows against the part reflected by light.
Add Highlights in the parts where the light reflects.

text: Draw a big round circle to indicate the shape of Jigglypuff's body and head.  Erase the top part of the shape (the head) and draw the tuft. It is kind of like a big G, only the top portion is a bit curved. On the left side of the tuft, draw an upside-down V on the head, so it looks like an ear. On the right side, make the upside-down V a bit slanted to the right. In the middle portion of the circle, erase the line there on the left side only and draw a small sideways v. Make sure the pointed part is facing the outside of Jigglypuff.  Add another small upside-down "v" to the inside of both ears.  At the bottom part of Jigglypuff, draw little ovals on both sides, a bit slanted. These will be the feet. For the other hand, draw a normal "v" right above the right foot.  Add the eyes right on the right and left side of the tuff. Draw a medium circle, and a smaller circle on the outside. Draw a even smaller circle inside the small circle. This will be the pupil. Right below the eyes, draw a tiny little curved smiling mouth.  Add colour to your finished Jigglypuff.  Add shadows against the part reflected by light.  Add Highlights in the parts where the light reflects.  Finished.
sentences: Draw a big round circle to indicate the shape of Jigglypuff's body and head.
Erase the top part of the shape (the head) and draw the tuft.
It is kind of like a big G, only the top portion is a bit curved.
On the left side of the tuft, draw an upside-down V on the head, so it looks like an ear.
On the right side, make the upside-down V a bit slanted to the right.
In the middle portion of the circle, erase the line there on the left side only and draw a small sideways v. Make sure the pointed part is facing the outside of Jigglypuff.
Add another small upside-down "v" to the inside of both ears.
At the bottom part of Jigglypuff, draw little ovals on both sides, a bit slanted.
For the other hand, draw a normal "v" right above the right foot.
Add the eyes right on the right and left side of the tuff.
Draw a medium circle, and a smaller circle on the outside.
Draw a even smaller circle inside the small circle.
Right below the eyes, draw a tiny little curved smiling mouth.
Add colour to your finished Jigglypuff.
Add shadows against the part reflected by light.
Add Highlights in the parts where the light reflects.
